name: local-iso-dt
description: Convert the most common types of dates into ISO8601/RFC3339-formatted YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS strings in the local timezone

scripts.prepublish:esm: tsc index.ts -t ES2015 --types node && mv index.js index.mjs
scripts.prepublish: npm run prepublish:esm; npm run prepublish:cjs

scripts.prepublish:esm: TypeScript can't generate .mjs output directly (https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/18442) and --outFile doesn't work with ES Modules
